idea:
Mehta Fabrics and Yarns LLP was founded in 2018 with the intention of maximizing the beneficial effects of sustainable fabrics. We are engaged in production and supply of Hemp and Linen Fabrics catering to both Domestic and International space.


Our approach is simple: to make people more comfortable than they ever thought possible wearing hemp. Our hemp fabrics are soft, breathable, and odor-resistant while wicking away moisture. With constant research and development, and feedback from the customers, we strive to consistently introduce new qualities in our Fabrics range for every sector.
name: Mehta Fabrics and Yarns LLP

idea:
In Health Sector as a Service Provider for Hospitals for Outsourcing of tedious and complex tasks. Smoothly running Central Government Aayushman Bharat PMJAY Scheme and Maharashtra State run Mahatma Jyotiba Fule Jan Arogya Yojana. It's a Concept Outsourcing And Social entrepreneurship. A Project Management Services in all sectors .

It will help the poor and needy beneficiary of the government scheme in urban and rural area. It will promote such schemes and help hospital to implement it in their area. KEVAT SEVA SETU LLP also organise health camps in rural and urban area to promote government flagship health scheme .Identify patients and treat the illness in very early stage so that diseases like cancer will reduce to take life. It will also help to collect a sizable data which is going to use for to decide the future planning of that particular geographical area in fields of Health and Education. KEVAT SEVA SETU LLP also provide services like event management . Outsourcing of Printing jobs . Supply of Manpower in all sectors as per the need of the industry.

         The organization works as a mediator between hospitals and patients. The procedure in today’s time in hospitals is extremely lengthy and tedious and some patients are not educated enough to understand about the submission of all the documents required in the hospital, so this organization basically works with the patients to ease the system procedure of the hospitals. This organization collects all the data and documents by communicating with the patients and submitting it to the hospital. It can be understood that they are easing the work of the hospitals by educating the patients and also helping the patients in a way because as be known hospitals in today’s time don’t have the sole purpose of just treating the patient without taking any record of the patient, the treatment has to be accompanied by the documents coming from the patient’s end in a stipulated time period. Sometimes the patient’s family members who accompany him/her, get worried and perplexed because arranging the documents instantly gets worrisome for them, in that situation KEVAT SEVA SETU LLP. intervenes and helps them, because why let the family members be in anxiety’s grip when they can be helped by educated, dedicated and sensitized individuals.

            Every year, the state launches schemes that look brilliant on paper but when it comes to the implementation, there is none. Similarly, in the hospitals with government schemes, hospital administration and piles of pending paper work, although a scheme is highly taken into consideration by the hospital staff or even KEVAT SEVA SETU LLP., fact of the matter is that it barely reaches its potential beneficiary in the hour of need. Having observed this, founder said “Logistics can only be carried out by a third party who is solely dedicated to getting the administration work, paper filing done and follow ups done.” Not just this, the expectation from the team is that it should be able to make swift decisions pertaining to the rules and maintain diligent strictness of the process. 

KEVAT SEVA SETU LLP.

LLP Identification Number: AAT-5348.
UDYAM AADHAR NO: - UDYAM-MH-33-0059247.
name: KEVAT SEVA SETU LLP

idea:
GRYPMED is formed based on the principles of open communication, empowerment, trust, integrity, and giving back to the community, wherein registered office in Mumbai.

We bring together a rich experience across all domains of Engineering & Technology, Pharmacy & Medical. We offer manufacturing, Integration, Assembly, Supply and Services to Government Engineering, Polytechnic, Pharmacy, ITI Institutions and Government medical colleges & hospitals for setting up their subject labs on turnkey basis.

We are excellent strategic product manufacturing, sales and Service Company. Two areas in particular stand out and differentiate us from others: the quality of our business development engineers and service engineers and their willingness and ability to excel.

We work hard to provide solutions that enable smooth communication and efficient collaboration with partners, industry experts, and especially our customers.

We're motivated by the simple fact that our success is tied to your success. To that end, our range of solution is developed with customer needs always in mind and not for the sake of innovation alone. Stated more plainly, it means that our existence is to provide real solutions for real customer problems that exist in the real world today.

GRYPMED is delicately focused in Medical lab setup, Instruments equipment, hospital furniture and laboratory consumables manufacturing for various Government health care institutions /organization /hospitals across India.
name: GRYPMED ENGINEERING LLP
